title: ProTech - Client
description: A blog platform for users to post articles, comment, and vote on topics of interest. Admins can manage posts and user interactions.
longDescription:
Key features include:

- Secure sign-up, login, logout, and JWT-based authentication
- Users can create posts with a rich text editor, categorize posts, and attach images.
- Users can upvote/downvote posts, comment, and interact with other posts.
- Manage users, posts, and analytics.
- Search and filter posts with debounced API calls. 
- Premium access for exclusive posts using Aamarpay.
